title: Add Quill media upload handlers for blog editor
scope: Implement Quill upload handlers for images, videos, and audio in blog management.
Use the existing blog media upload endpoint and static uploads path.
acceptance_criteria: Blog editor toolbar includes media upload actions.
Uploaded images/videos/audio are inserted into the editor content.
Uploads use `/api/admin/blog-posts/media` and store files under `static/uploads/blog`.
risk_notes: Large media files may impact page performance if embedded directly.
Browser MIME type detection varies for MP4 audio.
rollback_plan: Revert Quill toolbar media handlers in `frontend/src/components/BlogManagement.jsx`.
